title: Ken “Fixed” The iPhone Headphone Jack...
description: Kens genius iPhone headphone setup: Dragonfly Red DAC on Amazon:  iPhone Lightning to USB adapter on Amazon:  Belkin Dual Lightning Audio and Charge adapter on Amazon:   The other stuff we tried:  Beats urBeats 3 with Lightning headphones on Amazon:  ZERO Carbo Tenore headphones on Amazon:  Belkin Lightning + 3.5mm headphone jack adapter on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
